mapper.select: SELECT u.user_name, u.user_profile, d.dp_name as dp_name, m.mile_name as mile_no FROM user u JOIN department d ON u.dp_no = d.dp_no LEFT JOIN mileage m ON u.mile_no = m.mile_no WHERE u.user_no = #{user_no};
mapper.insert: insert into mile_introduce (mile_no, mile_title, mile_content, mile_route) values (#{mile_no}, #{mile_title}, #{mile_content}, #{mile_route});
